titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Correspondence and subject files of the Virginia Director of the Secretary of Administration and Finance, 1976-1984.
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
the Library of Virginia 32423

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Correspondence and subject files of the Secretary of Administration and Finance,
did.origination: Virginia. Secretary of Administration and Finance.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Office of the Secretary of Administration and the Office of the Secretary of Finance were created as two separate secretariats in 1972, but were combined into one secretariat in 1976. The two secretariats were again split into two separate entities in 1984.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This series includes the incoming and outgoing correspondence and memoranda of the Secretary of Administration and Finance. These records document the planning, development and establishment of policies and procedures of the secretariat and its assigned agencies. Also includes reports and subject files.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Correspondence and Subject Files of the Virginia Secretary of Administration and Finance. [cite specific date and Accession number used], State records collection, The Library of Virginia, Archives Branch, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Accession 32423 was transferred by the Virginia Secretary of Administration, June 24, 1985.
